short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the magical beauty of the aurora into your workspace with Custom Aurora Background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the magical beauty of the aurora into your workspace with Custom Aurora Background. This extension provides a customizable wallpaper featuring the vibrant aurora borealis, with shimmering green, purple, and pink lights dancing across the night sky. Every time you open a new tab, you'll be mesmerized by the enchanting display of the northern lights, creating an inspiring and serene workspace. Enjoy the dazzling and mystical beauty of this natural phenomenon right on your screen.
